Transylvania 1996

Release date:
January 1, 1996

James's old star rating:

★★☆☆☆

"average or below"

James's old number rating:

6/10

Old site description:

A fake documentary of myself as a tourist in Transylvania, exploring the woods, and stumbling upon the ruins of Dracula’s castle. It actually took place in the woods behind my house in New Jersey, U.S.A. where there was an old stone building that was crumbling away, with vines and trees growing all around it. It’s sort of a Blair-Witch kind of movie, but this was years before it.

James's old ratings:

Back in 2003 James included star ratings with each film he listed on his filmography on his website.

Later on he switched to ratings out of ten.

Eventually, he dropped the ratings entirely.

This archive is unoffical and run by a fan of Cinemassacre. Contact the Archivist
